data.comment: The big names in today's match at Giuseppe Meazza have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Federico La Penna, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Roberto Soriano for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 3, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Bologna.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 12, Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, In Milan Milan attack through Hakan Calhanoglu. The finish is off target, however.
Federico La Penna awards Bologna a goal kick.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 15, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Milan are whistled for offside.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Theo Hernandez for Milan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 17, Theo Hernandez for Milan is back on the field again.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 18, Nicolas Dominguez (Bologna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milan needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Milan are caught offside.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 22, Nicolas Dominguez of Bologna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Milan.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Milan.
The match at Giuseppe Meazza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Zlatan Ibrahimovic, who is down injured.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic is back on the pitch.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Bologna.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Bologna.
Milan's Matteo Gabbia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Bologna at Giuseppe Meazza.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Milan's Franck Kessie breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In Milan Milan attack through Ismael Bennacer. The finish is off target, however.
Federico La Penna awards Bologna a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 31, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mitchell Dijks (Bologna) has received a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Milan’s Samu Castillejo and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 33, Milan’s Samu Castillejo is on his feet again at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Milan move into a 1-0 lead through a Zlatan Ibrahimovic header.
In the minute 35, Great play from Theo Hernandez to set up the goal.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Bologna at Giuseppe Meazza.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
At Giuseppe Meazza, Samu Castillejo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Milan are pushing forward but Hakan Calhanoglu's finish is wide of the goal.
Bologna have a goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Milan.
In the minute 45, Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half is over.
Federico La Penna has blown to start the second-half.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 46, Alexis Saelemaekers is on a sub for Samu Castillejo for Milan.
In the minute 47, Zlatan Ibrahimovic for Milan drives towards goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan have been awarded a penalty in Milan...
Zlatan Ibrahimovic smashes in a penalty at Giuseppe Meazza. The score is now 2-0.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Roberto Soriano (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Important block from the Milan defence as Riccardo Orsolini fires in a strike for Bologna.
In Milan, Franck Kessie of Milan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Simon Kjaer (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 55, Milan pushes forward through Zlatan Ibrahimovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Federico La Penna blows against Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio for offside.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 57, Andreas Olsen is replacing Riccardo Orsolini for the away team.
The away team replace Nicolas Dominguez with Nicola Sansone.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Milan's Davide Calabria has run offside.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Federico La Penna signals a Milan throw-in in Bologna's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Milan close to the penalty box.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 63, Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 66, Musa Barrow (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Musa Barrow gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Milan defence.
In the minute 68, Milan's Ismael Bennacer misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 69, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brahim Diaz is replacing Hakan Calhanoglu for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 72, Leo Duarte is replacing Simon Kjaer for the home team.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 74, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Milan.
Takehiro Tomiyasu (Bologna) gets a yellow card.
Milan's Theo Hernandez gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Important block from the Bologna defence as Zlatan Ibrahimovic fires in a strike for Milan.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 77, Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a fourth substitution, with Sandro Tonali replacing Franck Kessie.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Milan.
In Milan Bologna drive forward through Andreas Olsen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Rodrigo Palacio with Federico Santander. This is the third substitution made today by Sinisa Mihajlovic.
The away team replace Roberto Soriano with Mattias Svanberg.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Free kick Milan.
Nicola Sansone for Bologna has been booked by Federico La Penna and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Free kick Milan.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's fifth substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Emanuel Vignato replacing Musa Barrow.
In the minute 84, Bologna's Nicola Sansone is on target but unsuccessful.
Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Milan's area.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Milan.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 86, Rade Krunic is on a sub for Ismael Bennacer for Milan.
Rade Krunic (Milan) has received a yellow card from Federico La Penna.
In the minute 87, Bologna are on the attack at Giuseppe Meazza, where Federico Santander is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Bologna drive upfield and Federico Santander gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Milan defender.
Bologna's Takehiro Tomiyasu breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 87, Federico La Penna awards Milan a goal kick.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Mitchell Dijks (Bologna) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Bologna in the half of Milan.
In the minute 89, Federico Santander returns to the field for Bologna after picking up a slight injury.
Federico La Penna waits before resuming play because Federico Santander for Bologna is still down.
Matteo Gabbia is booked for the home team.
At Giuseppe Meazza the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
